iron-sword.name: Iron Sword
iron-sword.description: A basic iron sword. +3 ATK, scales with STR, slightly sharper (+10% crit dmg).

brass-ring.name: Brass Ring
brass-ring.description: A simple ring. +1 M-ATK, modest crit chance (+5%).

assassin-ring.name: Assassin's Ring
assassin-ring.description: Slim ring favored by cutters. +8% crit chance.

keen-dagger.name: Keen Dagger
keen-dagger.description: A light dagger with a keen edge. +1 ATK, scales slightly with DEX, +15% crit damage.

slime_gel.name: Slime Gel
slime_gel.description: Sticky remains of a defeated Slime.

wolf_pelt.name: Wolf Pelt
wolf_pelt.description: Warm pelt from a slain Wolf.

bat_wing.name: Bat Wing
bat_wing.description: A thin, leathery wing from a Cave Bat.

orc_tooth.name: Orc Tooth
orc_tooth.description: A chipped tooth ripped from a defeated Orc.

bone_shard.name: Bone Shard
bone_shard.description: Splintered bone fragment dropped by Skeletons.

mana_leaf.name: Mana Leaf
mana_leaf.description: A faintly glowing herb carried by skeletal mages.

troll_hide.name: Troll Hide
troll_hide.description: Thick, coarse hide from a Troll â€” used in heavy armor crafting and rugged gear.

ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm
ectoplasm.description: Gelatinous remnants of a Specter. Useful for arcane reagents and ghostly charms.

frost_core.name: Frost Core
frost_core.description: A condensed shard of winter spirit energy. Component for ice magics and cold-forged items.

ember_fragment.name: Ember Fragment
ember_fragment.description: A still-warm ember from a Fire Imp. Used in fire-infused crafting and basic pyromancies.

serpent_scale.name: Serpent Scale
serpent_scale.description: A glossy scale from a Sea Serpent. Valued for water-resistant gear and certain alchemical brews.

steel-helmet.name: Steel Helmet
steel-helmet.description: Hefty helmet offering solid protection. +4 MaxHP, +1 DEF.

mythril-sword.description: A blade of enchanted mythril. +10 ATK, large STR scaling, +25% crit dmg.

mythril-shield.name: Mythril Shield
mythril-shield.description: Light yet incredibly strong. +5 DEF, +4 M-DEF.

mythril-helmet.name: Mythril Helmet
mythril-helmet.description: A magically resistant helm. +6 MaxHP, +2 M-DEF.

mythril-armor.name: Mythril Armor
mythril-armor.description: Elite armor forged from mythril. +6 DEF, +14 MaxHP, +2 M-DEF.

mythril-boots.name: Mythril Boots
mythril-boots.description: Light boots imbued with speed. +2 DEF, +2 DEX and +10% DEX (percent applied before derived).

mythril-charm.name: Mythril Charm
mythril-charm.description: A rare charm boosting magical precision. +3 M-ATK, +6% crit chance.
